definitions.definition: A serving vessel or container, typically circular in cross-section and typically higher than it is wide, with a relatively small mouth or spout , an ear handle and often a stopper or top .
The amount that a jug can hold.
( vulgar , slang , chiefly in the plural ) A woman 's breasts .
( Australia , New Zealand ) An upright electric kettle .
( CB radio slang , chiefly in the plural ) A kind of large, high-powered vacuum tube .
( US , slang ) The P-47 Thunderbolt fighter aircraft.
( climbing ) A hold large enough for both hands
( UK , informal ) A traditional dimpled glass with a handle, for serving a pint of beer .

main_definition: A serving vessel or container, typically circular in cross-section and typically higher than it is wide, with a relatively small mouth or spout , an ear handle and often a stopper or top .
secondary_definitions: The amount that a jug can hold.
( vulgar , slang , chiefly in the plural ) A woman 's breasts .
( Australia , New Zealand ) An upright electric kettle .
( CB radio slang , chiefly in the plural ) A kind of large, high-powered vacuum tube .
( US , slang ) The P-47 Thunderbolt fighter aircraft.
( climbing ) A hold large enough for both hands
( UK , informal ) A traditional dimpled glass with a handle, for serving a pint of beer .

definitions.definition: A small mixed breed of dog created by mating a Jack Russell terrier and a pug .

main_definition: A small mixed breed of dog created by mating a Jack Russell terrier and a pug .

definitions.label_groups: US , Roman Catholicism , countable or uncountable

main_definition: ( US , Roman Catholicism , countable or uncountable ) detention ( after-school student punishment )
